columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID of the VPC peering connection.

columns.name: status_code
columns.description: The status of the VPC peering connection. Possible values include: 'pending-acceptance', 'failed', 'expired', 'provisioning', 'active', 'deleting', 'deleted' or 'rejected'.

columns.name: accepter_cidr_block
columns.description: The IPv4 CIDR block for the accepter VPC.

columns.name: accepter_owner_id
columns.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the accepter VPC.

columns.name: accepter_region
columns.description: The Region in which the accepter VPC is located.

columns.name: accepter_vpc_id
columns.description: The ID of the accepter VPC.

columns.name: expiration_time
columns.description: The time that an unaccepted VPC peering connection will expire.

columns.name: requester_cidr_block
columns.description: The IPv4 CIDR block for the requester VPC.

columns.name: requester_owner_id
columns.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the requester VPC.

columns.name: requester_region
columns.description: The Region in which the requester VPC is located.

columns.name: requester_vpc_id
columns.description: The ID of the requester VPC.

columns.name: status_message
columns.description: A message that provides more information about the status, if applicable.

columns.name: accepter_cidr_block_set
columns.description: Information about the IPv4 CIDR blocks for the accepter VPC.

columns.name: accepter_ipv6_cidr_block_set
columns.description: The IPv6 CIDR block for the accepter VPC.

columns.name: accepter_peering_options
columns.description: Information about the VPC peering connection options for the accepter VPC.

columns.name: requester_cidr_block_set
columns.description: Information about the IPv4 CIDR blocks for the requester VPC.

columns.name: requester_ipv6_cidr_block_set
columns.description: The IPv6 CIDR block for the requester VPC.

columns.name: requester_peering_options
columns.description: Information about the VPC peering connection options for the requester VPC.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The tags assigned to the resource.
